description: One-pot meals don't have to be limited to pastas or heavy stews! This one-skillet curried quinoa is a light and richly flavorful meal, made even easier by the use of frozen veggies.
keywords: one pot curry, One-Skillet Curried Quinoa with Butternut Squash & Chickpeas, vegan curry recipe, vegetarian curry recipe
name: One-Skillet Curried Quinoa with Butternut Squash & Chickpeas
recipeIngredient: 14 ounces chickpeas, drained and rinsed (1 can)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the olive oil to a large pot over medium heat. When hot, add the onion and saute until translucent and tender, 3-4 minutes.

Stir in the curry powder, ginger, turmeric, and cardamom. Saut√© for 30 seconds, until fragrant, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk, water, quinoa, and 1 teaspoon salt, scraping the bottom of the pot to remove any stuck bits. Bring to a boil and then lower heat to a simmer. Cover and cook for 15 minutes, then stir in the frozen vegetables and chickpeas. Return the lid to the pot and cook for 5-15 minutes more, or until the quinoa is tender and most of the liquid has been absorbed.

After the quinoa is done, turn off the heat and let sit, covered, until the vegetables and chickpeas are warmed through, 5-6 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice. Taste and add additional salt if desired. Garnish with parsley and serve.
